author: Daryl Ford
comment: Blank screen on LG Watch Sport

author: Daniel Duarte
comment: Looks good but the battery is so bad

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback.Please feel free to contact our email address and give us more info about it in detail.Thank you.

author: paul twidale
comment: One of the coolest faces
title: Love it

author: jonathan melendez
comment: This watch face is one of the best faces on the market that I have found!. The only thing I think it needs improvement in is. Interaction! Click on the weather all and see the forecast. Click on the time - get a stop watch or alarm. The ambient like could use some work also. Maybe invert it. Just make it black n white. But this face is still awesome! Worth the cash...wait..I forgot if it's free or paid... Anyways, little thing's need work. Great face
title: Really good, but could be better

author: Bigs73
comment: This is a great looking watchface and one of my faves.   The only issue is when you select a different colour from default, when it wakes up,  it goes orange then the colour you chose...  Everything else is super.
title: On the top of my list!

author: mike peterson
comment: I love this watch face. Its one of the only watch faces that I've found that can pass for a traditional watch in ambient mode. Also the full color ambient mode doesnt drain the battery on my LG Gwatch R like some other watch faces. I have one request though. Ambient mode is always the default orange color. I'd like the color in ambient mode to be the same color that is selected for active mode.

author: Eli Morales
comment: Cool!!!
title: Cool!!!

author: Kabish
comment: I can confirm what others have mentioned. When you change the face to another color other than the default gold it will flash gold then the selected color. While not a huge issue, it's pretty annoying. Still worth the money, but it really should be fixed.
title: Default Face Issue

author: Ron McInnis
comment: Color can be changed, but there's a glitch that reverts back to a flash of the original gold when watch activates just before switching to chosen color. Fix that and it's 5 stars
title: Color change

author: Robert Sink
comment: like this watchface, but little information is given as to what weather api is used; so, I struggle when these lose sync.  Other than that, looks good.. please is misspelled in gen. writeup near the bottom.
title: Nice Face

author: JC Jollant
comment: I was pleased by the stylish look of this watch face but was quickly disappointed by three things. - After one day of use (without ambient mode), my battery was at 5% down from my usual 50%. I must admit I normaly use simpler faces. - I changed the background color, but everytime the face activates, the default color is briefly displayed before switching to the one I selected. Too bad the default is orange which shows a lot. - Passed the first few minutes, I was only interested by actual time which kind of gets lost in the bells and whistles.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I'd like to improve what you mentioned.Plz feel free to contact our email address and give us more info about it in detail.Thank you.

title: Nice looks but battery killer

author: Terry Watton
comment: Ambient screen colour doesn't match illuminated option, so there an annoying colour change lag when the screen illuminates. Otherwise not a bad watchface.
title: OK, could be better

author: Donny Rogers
comment: I like this one but wish I could change the ambient mode color to match the led color so it wouldn't change from my choice of blue back to default orange color when it switches to ambient mode.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
The weather is now working correctly.
Would you please re-check,if you have any questions,
plz feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: Good but....

author: Paul Jallen
comment: This is the only watchface I have purchased or downloaded that cannot be enabled. Spent 20 minutes trying to get this to show up, so no refund...
title: No way to enable!

author: Rafael Guzman
comment: It kills the battery on my 360. 6 hours of use and drop to 23%.
title: Great face but....

author: Josh Hartman
comment: Face used to FC but Dev updated, fairly quickly at that, now working again!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app available for Android Wear 5.0 firmware.
Would you please check the update.Thank you.

title: Working better after update

author: Kevin Pangesa
comment: Solution? When i tap choose watchface, nothing happens
title: Cant choose watchface color

author: Dusty Roads
comment: Very impressed, works as advertised, easily worth the price.
title: ZTE ZMAX / Moto360

author: Dave S
comment: Would like the addition of white as a color option.

author: Alan Taylor
comment: Great attention to detail.
title: Watchface

author: Daniel Simunic
comment: Used this for a day and ended up with 5% left by 4pm. In comparison to other watch faces where I'd still be around 44%.   Otherwise great design and awesome information
title: Battery life issue

author: Benjamin Powers III
comment: When I bought this, I didn't notice the Moto360 designated on the watch face. I have the LG R!  Please remove this text us if possible or ć can I get my money back.I can't see ever using this fair face now that I have a superior smartwatch.    :)
title: Boo!

author: James Baird
comment: I have several of the smartwatch bureaux faces. They are my favorites out of all the choices for watch faces.  Really love the fact you can change the background colors. Great work!
title: Awesome

author: Reid Sartin
comment: First watch face I've bought, and it's definitely worth the price to me.  All the information I want at a glance -- batteries on watch and phone, weather, date, time, etc.  Colors really pop.  Well designed and easy to read.  Moto 360.
title: Awesome!

author: Michael Potts
comment: Pleasure to use. Thankyou. It would be nice to have a label option.. I'm another LG GWR nut.
title: Does what it says cleanly.

author: Poloasis
comment: Simply stunning watch face for the 360.
title: Wow

author: shrihara Palanetra
comment: Looks amazing

author: Delbert Matlock
comment: Overall information layout is good but the humidity numbers can be a bit hard to read.    The analog clock in the corner is useless to me as I'm a digital person.  That space could probably be better used with a sunrise/sunset chart like is found on the F03 WatchFace.  Alternatively, put the battery percents and icons where the analog clock is and use the space at the bottom for the sunrise/sunset chart.  Also, where is the black and white mode for this face?  I would actually like to do colored text on a black background most of the time.  Note: I've seen a few app crashes if I switch away from this face and then switch back to it again but the face does come right back to this is more of an annoyance than a real problem.
title: Good information layout but slightly hard to read weather numbers

author: Sawyer Landers
comment: I love the customization options but it would be nice if I could set the wind speed unit to knots if possible. Thanks for the great watch face!
title: This watch face looks great!

author: ohnara minh
comment: Barometric not correct
title: LG g3
